amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to propose or finalize any major regulation from November 8, 2016 to January 20, 2017.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds, between Nov. 8, 2016 through Jan. 20, 2017 to be used to propose or finalize a regulatory action that is likely to result in a rule that may have an annual effect on the economy of $100,000,000 or more.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A058) offered by Mr. Mullin.
